data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 12,521 believers in Orange Walk against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Orange Walk, Belize
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Orange Walk. Through your servants plant 10 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Orange Walk to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Orange Walk. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Sindhi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Sindhi people.
Father, let those from the 12,521 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 10 new simple churches in the state of Orange Walk, Belize. Place a simple church in every community of the 53,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Orange Walk, Belize to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 40,879 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Orange Walk
location.people_groups_list: South Asian, general, Chinese, general, Jew, English-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: South Asian, general (7,900), Chinese, general (11,000), Jew, English-speaking (3,500)
